abstract: Private investigator Loren Berger declines to discuss her inquiry about New York University Prof Andrew Ross, who criticized exploitation of migrant workers building university's campus in Abu Dhabi; is also gathering information about New York Times reporter Ariel Kaminer.
lead_paragraph: A private investigator making inquiries about a professor who criticized the exploitation of migrant workers building the university’s Abu Dhabi campus won’t say whom she is working for.

headline.main: Murky Inquiry Targets Critic of N.Y.U. Role in Abu Dhabi, and a Reporter
headline.print_headline: Murky Inquiry Targets Critic of N.Y.U. Role in Abu Dhabi, and a Reporter

snippet: A private investigator making inquiries about a professor who criticized the exploitation of migrant workers building the university’s Abu Dhabi campus won’t say whom she is working for.
